st: Dil Karta Hai Aag Laga Doon Is Zamaane Ko,
s:
Dil Karta Hai Aag Laga Doon Is Zamaane Ko,
Jisne Dard Hi Dard Diya Har Diwaane Ko,

Har Pal Zakham Khaya Hai Dil Ne Mere,
Ab Kya Rah Gaya Aur Aajmaane Ko….

st: Maine Bhi Dil Ka Dard Bayan Kiya Hai,
s:
Maine Bhi Dil Ka Dard Bayan Kiya Hai,
Khusi Ka Har Lamha Tere Naam Kiya Hai,

Dekho Jara Yeh Mera Bigda Hua Mukaddar,
Kismat Ne Har Jagah Naakam Kiya Hai….

st: Woh Chahte Hain Hum Aabad Rahein,
s:
Woh Chahte Hain Hum Aabad Rahein,
Barbaadi Mein Bhi Kasar Nahi,

Har Dard Hans Ke Saha,
Phir Bhi Un Par Hua Asar Nahi….

st: Dard Ki Har Ek Hadd Se Ab Guzar Gaya Hon Main,
s:
Dard Ki Har Ek Hadd Se Ab Guzar Gaya Hon Main,
Phir Kabhi Na Simtunga Youn Bikhar Gaya Hon Main,

Mout Bas Naheen Aati Rooh Ke Nikalne Se,
Sans Mujh Main Baqi Hai Phir Bhi Mer Gaya Hon Main,

Zindagi Main Jitni Bhi Roshni Thi Uss Se Thi,
Mustaqil Andhero Main Ab Utar Gaya Hon Main,

Baam O Darr Bhi Us Ke Baad Ho Gaye Hain You Khamosh,
Aur Dil Ulajhta Hai Jabb Bhi Ghar Gaya Hon Main,

Us Ka Sath Jab Tak Tha Rung Rung Mausam The,
Bas Khizaan Ke Mausam Main Ab Thhehar Gaya Hon Main…

st: Aankhe To Pyar Mein Dill Ki Juban Hoti Hai,
s:
Aankhe To Pyar Mein Dill Ki Juban Hoti Hai,
Chahat To Sada Bejuban Hoti Hai,
Pyar Mein Dard Bhi Mile To Kya Ghabrana,
Suna Hai Dard Se Chahat Or Jawan Hoti Hai…

st: Woh Ghamon Ko Mujhse Milane Ko Mila Tha,
s:
Woh Ghamon Ko Mujhse Milane Ko Mila Tha,
Yaar Mere Dard Badhanae Ko Mila Tha,

Main Dosh Bhala Kya Usko Du, Toh Kaise Du,
Woh Zindagi Se Nijaat Dilane Ko Mila Tha….

st: Aapne Toh Yeh Pooch Liya Bas Mere Dosto,
s:
Aapne Toh Yeh Pooch Liya Bas Mere Dosto,
Ki Unke Baare Mein Hamara Kya Khyal Hai,

Aapne Jara Yeh Bhi Toh Poochha Hota Hamse,
Unko Dekhne Ke Baad Hamara Kya Haal Hai….

st: Jabse Dekha Hai Najron Ne Aapko,
s:
Jabse Dekha Hai Najron Ne Aapko,
Inko Aur Kuchh Bhi Najar Nahi Aata,
Na Jaane Kaisa Kiya Hai Jaadu Aapne,
Koi Aur Chehra Isko Nahi Bhata….

st: Mere Dil Mein Rahna Tum Oh Sanam,
s:
Mere Dil Mein Rahna Tum Oh Sanam,
Kya Karna Is Char Deewari Ka,
Bas Hum Jee Lenge Ek Dooje Ke Liye,
Chhod Denge Is Duniya Sari Ko….

st: Teri Har Ada Mein Koi Baat Hai,
s:
Teri Har Ada Mein Koi Baat Hai,
Main Deewana Sa Hua Jaata Hun,
Har Kisi Mein Dekhta Hun Tumko,
Khud Se Begana Hua Jata Hun…

st: Kis Baat Ka Marham Denge Yaar,
s:
Kis Baat Ka Marham Denge Yaar,
Jab Haal Hamara Na Jaane Koi,
Sab Dekhte Hain Upri Dikhave Ko Hi,
Mere Dil Ka Dard Na Pahchane Koi…

st: Dekho Yaaro Hamein Aawaj Na Dena,
s:
Dekho Yaaro Hamein Aawaj Na Dena,
Hum Na Wapas Kabhi Aa Paayenge,
Us Din Manana Yaaro Id Tum,
Jab Hum Duniya Se Chale Jaayenge…

st: Muskaraun Bhi Main Toh Kaise Yaaro,
s:
Muskaraun Bhi Main Toh Kaise Yaaro,
Kya Mila Hai Mujhko Zamane Mein,

Mere Jakhamon Par Lagaya Na Marham,
Dard Aur Badha Sabko Dikhane Mein…

st: Baad Aapke Samjhata Hai Kon Mujhe,
s:
Baad Aapke Samjhata Hai Kon Mujhe,
Mera Dard Badhane Lage Hain Yeh Log,

Kiske Kandhe Rakhkar Sar Main Roun,
Har Pal Hi Rulane Lage Hain Yeh Log…

st: Aap Kya Jaano Kya Hota Hai Dard Judai Ka,
s:
Aap Kya Jaano Kya Hota Hai Dard Judai Ka,
Humse Yeh Puchho Kaisa Haal Hota Hai Tanhai Ka,

Mout Ko Laga Lete Hain Majboor Hokar Gale Yaaro,
Aisa Hota Hai Jab Bhi Hota Hai Hashar Rushwai Ka…

st: Na Jaane Kaise Dard E Dil Chhupa Lete Hain Log,
s:
Na Jaane Kaise Dard E Dil Chhupa Lete Hain Log,
Na Jaane Kaise Gham Mein Bhi Muskura Lete Hain Log,

Sagar Ki Zindagi Toh Ek Khuli Kitab Hai,
Na Jaane Kaise Chehre Par Chehra Chadha Lete Hain Log…

st: Kabhi Dard Isne Diya Kabhi Dard Usne Diya,
s:
Kabhi Dard Isne Diya Kabhi Dard Usne Diya,
Jakhmon Ko Magar Kisi Ne Bhi Seene Nahi Diya,

Aaj Farista Kahte Hain Sabhi Mere Yaar Mujhko,
Magar Insano Ki Tarah Kabhi Jeene Nahi Diya….

st: Kamzor Nahi Hoon Main,
s:
Kamzor Nahi Hoon Main,
Shayad Hoon Majboor,

Dil Pe Pathar Rakhoon Main,
Nahi Mujhe Ghuroor,

Par Voh Dard Nahi Seh Paungi Main,
Agar Hogaye Tum Mujhse Door…

st: Khuda Ka Sukr Karta Hai Sagar,
s:
Khuda Ka Sukr Karta Hai Sagar,
Ki Usne Aapko Hum Se Mila Diya,

Yeh Alag Baat Hai Eh Mere Dost,
Aapne Darde Dil Hamara Badha Diya…

st: Har Dard Ko Toh Mitana Mushkil Hota Hai,
s:
Har Dard Ko Toh Mitana Mushkil Hota Hai,
Gujri Yaadon Ko Bhulana Muskil Hota Hai,

Aur Baaton Ko Toh Hum Bhula Sakte Hain Sagar,
Magar Pahle Pyar Ko Bhulana Muskil Hota Hai…

st: Bahut Jee Chuke Hum Gairon Ke Liye Sagar,
s:
Bahut Jee Chuke Hum Gairon Ke Liye Sagar,
Ab Apno Ke Liye Hi Bas Jiyenge Hum,

Bahut Le Liye Hain Dard Auron Ke Humne,
Ab Toh Apno Ke Ghamon Ko Seeyenge Hum…

st: Dard Saho Magar Aahein Na Bharo,
s:
Dard Saho Magar Aahein Na Bharo,
Yeh Jamane Ka Kaisa Dastoor Hai,

Na Mile Woh Hamse Na Mile Hum Unse,
Main Bhi Majboor Woh Bhi Majboor Hain…

st: Meelon Door Jaakar Bhi Hum Tumse Door Na Jaa Sake,
s:
Meelon Door Jaakar Bhi Hum Tumse Door Na Jaa Sake,
Dil Mein Kitni Bechaini Hai Yeh Bata Na Sake,

Dard Is Baat Ka Nahi Ke Hum Ab Mil Na Sake,
Dard Is Baat Ka Hai Ke Yaadon Mein Hum Tadpate Rahe,

Kyon Yaad Humein Karte Ho Itna,
Kyon Pyar Humein Karte Ho Itna,

Kyon Aakhir Kyon,

Door Rahkar Ab Tumse Or Jee Na Sakenge,
Gham Se In Aankhon Ke Ashq Ko Ab Bahne Denge,

Kya Pata Kal Tumhe Hum Par Taras Aa Jaaye,
Umarbhar Is Aash Mein Hum Jee Hi Lenge….

st: Jab Maalum Hai Tujhko Ki Yeh Tere Apne Bhi Matlabi Hain,
s:
Jab Maalum Hai Tujhko Ki Yeh Tere Apne Bhi Matlabi Hain,
Toh Fir Bata Kyu Tu Inse Dil Apna Lagata Hai,

Jab Auron Ke Dil Mein Nahi Hota Tere Liye Dard Kabhi,
Fir Sagar Tu Kyu Auron Ke Liye Apna Dil Tadpata Hai….

st: Aisa Nahi Ke Sagar Ko Aarju Nahi Hai Khusiyo Ki,
s:
Aisa Nahi Ke Sagar Ko Aarju Nahi Hai Khusiyo Ki,
Magar Ise In Dard Mein Bhi Ek Ajib Sa Maja Aata Hai,

Yeh Isliye Bhi Badhana Chahta Hai Apne Dard Ko Dosto,
Kyunki Kahte Hain Badh Jaane Par Dard Dava Ban Jata Hai…

st: Aakar Hamari Kabr Par Phool Chdhaye Sabhi Ne,
s:
Aakar Hamari Kabr Par Phool Chdhaye Sabhi Ne,
Na Laya Saath Kante Koi Jinka Hamein Sahara Tha,

Yeh Mante Hain Hum Ki Yeh Dil Tha Hamara Magar,
Is Mein Sanbhala Tha Jo Woh Dard Tumhara Tha…

st: Na Jaane Yeh Kaisa Hai Mola, Dastoor E Mohabaat,
s:
Na Jaane Yeh Kaisa Hai Mola, Dastoor E Mohabaat,
Woh Door Rahkar Bhi Dil Ke Karib Rahta Hai,

Har Koi Jaanta Hai Milenge Ismein Jakham, Fir Bhi,
Har Koi, Yaar Ka Diya Dard, Hans Kar Sahta Hai…

st: Dard Kuchh Din Toh Mehmaan Thahre,
s:
Dard Kuchh Din Toh Mehmaan Thahre,
Hum Hathi Hain Ke Mejbaan Thahre,

Sirf Tanhai Sirf Virani,
Yeh Najar Jab Uthe Jahan Thahre,

Koun Se Jakham Par Padav Kiya,
Dard ke Kaafile Kahan Thahre,

Kaise Dil Mein Khusi Basa Loo Main,
Kaise Muthi Mein Yeh Dhuan Thahre,

Thi Kahin Niyat Kahi Sahas,
Hum Kahin Inke Darmiyan Thahre…

st: Abhi Jameer Mein Thodi Si Jaan Baki Hai,
s:
Abhi Jameer Mein Thodi Si Jaan Baki Hai,
Abhi Hamara Ko Imtehaan Baki Hai,

Hamare Ghar Ko Toh Ujde Huye Jamana Hua,
Magar Suna Hai Abhi Woh Makan Baaki Hai,

Hamari Unse Jo Thi Baat Woh Khatam Huyi,
Magar Khamosh Sa Kuchh Darmiyan Baaki Hai,

Hamare Jahan Ki Basti Mein Aag Aisi Lagi,
Ki Jo Tha Khak Hua Ik Dukan Baaki Hai,

Woh Jakham Bhar Gaya Arsa Hua Magar Ab Tak,
Jara Sa Dard Jara Sa Nishaan Baaki Hai,

Jara Si Baat Jo Faili Toh Dastan Ban Gayi,
Woh Baat Khatm Huyi Daastan Baaki Hai….

st: Dil Ka Har Dard Kho Gaya Jaise,
s:
Dil Ka Har Dard Kho Gaya Jaise,
Main Toh Pathar Ka Ho Gaya Jaise,

Daag Baki Nahi Ke Nishan Kahun,
Koi Deevar Dho Gaya Jaise,

Jagta Jahan Gham Ki Dhoop Mein Tha,
Chhav Paate Hi So Gaya Jaise,

st: Raat ki raah mein taaron ki kaman roshan hai
s:
Raat ki raah mein taaron ki kaman roshan hai
Chand mein kon hai yeh kiska makaan roshan hai,

Jisko dekho mere maathe ki taraf dekhe
Dard hota hai kahan aur kahan roshan hai,

Yaad jab kabhi ghar ki aati hai toh lagta hai
Raat ki raah mein sishe ka makaa roshan hai,

Chand jis aag mein jalta hai usi shole se
Barf ki waadi mein kuhre ka dhuan roshan hai,

Subah se dhund rahe the ki kahan hai suraj
Ab najar aaye ho toh sara jahan roshan hai…

st: Ab toh angaro ke lab choom kar so jaayenge
s:
Ab toh angaro ke lab choom kar so jaayenge
Hum woh pyase hain jo dariyaon ko tarsayenge,

Khwab aaine hain aankhon mein liye firte ho
Dhoop mein chamkenge tootenge toh chubh jaayenge,

Neend ki fakta sahami huyi hai aankhon mein
Teer yadon ki kamigahon(sikari) se fir aayenge,

Subah tak dil ki khidkiyon ko khula rahne do
Dard gumraah fariste hain kahan jaayenge…

st: Meri Yaadon Ko Ek Ek Gali So Gayi,
s:
Meri Yaadon Ko Ek Ek Gali So Gayi,
Mere Khwabon Ke Sare Armaan So Gaye,

Dil Sabb E Tar Ki Saltnat Ho Gaya,
Jab Se Ashkon Ke Sahjaade So Gaye,

Pathron Ki Jamee Pathron Ke Ped,
Pathron Ke Makan Pathron Ke Bashar,

st: Achha Mana Ke Koi Usul Bhi Jaruri Hai,
s:
Achha Mana Ke Koi Usul Bhi Jaruri Hai,
Koi Toh Jine Ka Dastoor Yeh Bataye Bhi,

Gira Diya Najron Se Use Namurad Ne Kyu,
Girarne Wala Usko Aakar Uthaye Bhi,

Nadi Ki Dhaar Ko Roka Hai Gaanv Walon Ne,
Ab Wohi Be Dard Ruki Dhar Ko Bahayein Bhi,

Unki Baton Par Nahin Shak Kisi Ko Hai Waise,
Apr Bharose Ke Liye Kuchh Karishme Dikhayen Bhi…

st: Ab Use Kya Yaad Karna,
s:
Ab Use Kya Yaad Karna,
Vakr Gujra Tha Gujarana,

Kabhi Halke Halke Kabhi Bhari,
Kadmon Mein Chadna Utrana,

Dard Ke Sailab Mein Bhi,
Khusi Ka Hai Ek Jharna,

st: Dilkash Bhari Bahaar Mein Dabdab Si Nigahen,
s:
Dilkash Bhari Bahaar Mein Dabdab Si Nigahen,
Andar Kahin Se Udhti Hain Dardili Karahen,

Khsiyon Ke Bahane Kai Vaise Toh Hain Yahan Par,
Par Dard Mand Ke Liye Bas Ask Aur Aahen,

Duniya Ke Liye Jeene Ke Hain Lakhon Yu Tarike,
Beemar Ke Khatir Toh Mahaj Mout Bhari Rahein,

Dukh Baar Baar Usko Rulata Raha Hai Aksar,
Woh Baar Baar Leta Raha Khuda Ki Panahein…

st: Dil Nichod Kar Dard Nikalo,
s:
Dil Nichod Kar Dard Nikalo,
Ya Fir Koi Rog Na Paalo,

Kuchh Lena Hai De Do Pahle,
Tab Basti Mein Dera Dalo,

Bhukhe Pet Raag Na Foote,
Jine Ki Khatir Kuchh Daalo,

Notanki Hai Basti Basti,
Parda Jara Jhakkas Utha Lo,

Koi Asar Na In Baaton Mein,
Mudda Koi Thos Uchhalo…

st: Lo Raat Huyi Din Niklega,
s:
Lo Raat Huyi Din Niklega,
Fir Sooraj Sona Uglega,

Hogi Bhagdar Galiye Bagiyo,
Mitti Ka Chehra Badlega,

Is Kone Se Us Kone Tak,
Khusiyon Wala Hal Fislega,

Suraj Chanda Wali Mashal,
Lekar Budha Vakt Chalega,

Insani Jajbat Odhkar,
Dil Hi Dil Mein Dard Palega…

st: Doobega Din Raat Uthegi,
s:
Doobega Din Raat Uthegi,
Dard Bhigoyi Baat Uthegi,

Kal Ki Basi Bachi Kahani,
Liye Nayi Kahnat Uthegi,

Mere Tere Uske Riste,
Aapas Ki Barat Uthegi,

st: Yun Dhire Dhire Dhal Rahi Hai Raat,
s:
Yun Dhire Dhire Dhal Rahi Hai Raat,
Pal Rahi Hai Man Main Koi Baat,

Badi Gahri Chot Thi Shayad Lagi,
Abhi Tak Gambhir Hai Haalaat,

Lotkar Dekha Na Fir Usne Idhar,
Kiya Jisne Ishq Ki Shuruat,

Ruk Gayi Thi Thoda Sustane Abhi,
Fir Chalegi Dard Ki Baaraat,

Bewafayi Kaho Ya Kuchh Aur Hi,
Husn Ne Fir Ishq Ko Di Maat…

st: Jite Jite Ek Din Mar Jaayenge,
s:
Jite Jite Ek Din Mar Jaayenge,
Yaad Bhi Shayad Tumhe Na Aayenge,

Lakhon Log Gujar Gaye Is Leek Se,
Lout Kar Bhi Kabhi Kya Payenge,

Jane Kab Se Chal Rahe Hain Silsile,
Janmate Marte Yeh Log Batayenge,

Rishte Naaton Ki Kahani Dard Bhari,
Sadiyon Bachon Ko Bujarg Sunayenge,

Aadmi Ko Aadmi Tak Nahi Kahte,
Julm Kitne Nakli Log Uthayenge…

st: Mere Dil Mein Dard Ke Ped Hain,
s:
Mere Dil Mein Dard Ke Ped Hain,
Yahan Koi Patjhad Ka Bhay Nahin,

Yeh Darkhat Kitane Ajib The,
Sabhi Mousamo Mein Hare Bhare Rahe,

Woh Kalaam Jinki Chhatein Udi,
Wohi Shamiyane Mein Dafan Hain,

Teer E Sher Dil Mein Utar Gaye,
Jo Khare The Sikke Khare Rahe…

st: Tera Sach Hai Tere Dard Mein,
s:
Tera Sach Hai Tere Dard Mein,
Jhoot Likha Hai Sab Kitabon Mein,

Ek Se Mil Ke Sab Se Mil Lijiye,
Aaj Har Sakhs Hai Nakabo Mein,

Tera Milna Tere Nahin Milna,
Ek Raasta Kayi Sarabo Mein,

Unki Nakamiyo Ko Bhi Giniye,
Jinki Sohrat Hai Kamyabo Mein,

Roshni Thi Sawal Ki Had Tak,
Har Najar Kho Gayi Jawabon Mein…

st: Rote Rote Hans Pade Koi,
s:
Rote Rote Hans Pade Koi,
Meri Aahen Is Tarah Royi,

Kanto Kanto Chil Gaya Daaman,
Nigaho Ne Roshani Khoyi,

Jajba Mera Jahan Tak Pahuncha,
Vakt Ne Viranagi Boyi,

Har Kadam Par Bichati Kaante,
Uski Saajis Nafrton Dhoyi,

Ghamon Ki Ghathri Huyi Bhari,
Dard Mein Hi Jaise Duboyi…

st: Jigar Koi Cheer Jata Hai,
s:
Jigar Koi Cheer Jata Hai,
Rat Bhar Na Hosh Aata Hai,

Dhire Dhire Jam Gayi Mahfil,
Dard Fir Feri Lagata Hai,

Raat Budhi Jadugarni Si,
Kala Jaadu Thar Tharata Hai,

Andhere Par Ujle Se Paiband,
Chand Ka Mochi Bithata Hai,

Pyas Se Sukha Halak Kaise,
Kaanto Jaisa Kharkharat Hai…

st: Aisa Bhi Koi Dard Se Behal Kyu Hua,
s:
Aisa Bhi Koi Dard Se Behal Kyu Hua,
Ki Ranjo Gham Ke Putle Ko Malal Kyu Hua,

Apne Hi Bojh Se Nahin Tuta Hai Aasman,
Apne Gunahon Ka Nahin Khyal Kyu Hua,

Woh Gaay Charata Tha Jangal Ke Kinaron Par,
Man Moh Lene Wala Hi Gopal Kyu Hua,

Dil Se Nilkalne Wali Baatein Ajib Hoti,
Apna Hi Ilam Ji Ka Janjal Kyu Hua,

Har Aadmi Ka Naseeb Hota Nahi Barabar,
Sabko Saman Karne Fir Bawal Kyu Hua…

st: Aakhir Ko Yeh Dil Kya Kare Bechara,
s:
Aakhir Ko Yeh Dil Kya Kare Bechara,
Tumne Bhi Teer Mara Usne Bhi Teer Mara,

Dekho Toh Zindagi Ka Yeh Kaisa Fasana Hai,
Aankho Ke Samne Hi Hai Mout Ka Najara,

Apna Samjhne Wala Shayad Hi Kahin Koi,
Auro Ki Mahfil Mein Kya Kaam Tha Hamara,

Apni Najar Mein Girkar Jaayen Kahan Musafir,
Mitti Mein Ja Milega Toota Huya Sitara,

Woh Dard Wali Ghatri Chhuta Bhi Nahin Koi,
Fir Aansuon Mein Bhiga Kyukar Jahan Sara…

st: Dil Dard Suna Karta Dil Dard Kaha Karta,
s:
Dil Dard Suna Karta Dil Dard Kaha Karta,
Ahsaas Ka Samandar Chupchap Baha Karta,

Duniya Se Mohabbat Ab Mahsush Nahin Hoti,
Man Kisme Raha Karta Dil Kis Me Basa Karta,

Woh Dosti Ki Roti Sapne Ki Baat Lagti Hai,
Lanat Sidushmani Ki Taumar Saha Jata,

Aaye The Jamane Mein Dekhenge Kuchh Najare,
Barbad Hone Wala Aur Kya Yahan Karta,

Manmaniyo Ka Malik Kamjoriyo Ka Putla,
Kuchh Galtiya Bhi Hoti Jo Sara Jahan Karta…

st: Hole Hole Dil Ka Dard Badha Hai,
s:
Hole Hole Dil Ka Dard Badha Hai,
Tanhai Ka Dard Athah Chada Hai,

Ab Umeedo Ki Tassliya Chhodo,
Naya Paitra Fir Se Ek Ghada Hai,

Sarangi Tanhai Ki Mat Chhodo,
Abhi Abhi Fir Uska Patr Padha Hai,

Kis Se Karna Sikwe Aur Sikayat,
Aawara Dil Par Iljaam Madha Hai,

Sadiyon Ka Sannata Mann Mein Utra,
Bechare Dil Ne Kya Julm Lada Hai…

st: Dil Hai Toh Dard Hoga,
s:
Dil Hai Toh Dard Hoga,
Tejab Sard Hoga,

Halat Ka Sataya,
Bebas Sa Mard Hoga,

Riston Ki Aandhiya Hain,
Maathe Pe Gard Hoga,

Kuchh Bookh Kuchh Jalalat,
Har Sakhs Jard Hoga,

Pustak Badi Purani,
Ukhda Sa Fard Hoga…

st: Dard Dhire Dhire Pakta Hai,
s:
Dard Dhire Dhire Pakta Hai,
Shola Din Raat Dhadkata Hai,

Bojhal Lamhe Bhari Bhari,
Parvat Sa Vakt Sarkata Hai,

Umeede Poori Ho Sabki,
Kya Aakhir Woh Kar Sakta Hai,

Is Bure Vakt Se Nikle Toh,
Uska Imaan Bichkata Hai,

Do Kadam Nahin Chal Paayega,
Aisa Is Vakt Adkata Hai…

st: Saari Vakt Vakt Ki Baaten,
s:
Saari Vakt Vakt Ki Baaten,
Inka Ranj Nahin Koi,

Apni Chaal Chala Karte Jo,
Wohi Toh Mastane Hain,

Arsa Gujra Tumko Dekhe,
Ab Tak Dard Kaleje Mein,

Ask Tumhare Kaynaat Ke,
Baaki Taane Baane Hain,

Mahfil Mahfil Uske Kisse,
Har Dil Mein Uska Dera,

Pagal Loogn Ko,
Duniya Mein Kuchh Aise Diwane Hain…

st: Jo Kahani Dard Se Apne Banaunga,
s:
Jo Kahani Dard Se Apne Banaunga,
Unko Jarur Ek Baar Toh Sunaunga,

Pahuncha Hu Girate Padte Tumhare Vajood Mein,
Hai Chak Jigar Toh Kya Jalwa Dikhaunga,

Aur Hi Hoti Hain Pakija Dil Ki Baatein,
Gardish Ke Sitare Ki Tarah Cham Chmaunga,

Duniya Ka Toh Dastoor Hamesha Se Wohi Hai,
Ab Marte Vakt Khak Unhe Badal Paaunga…

st: Dard Apne Bhi Paraye Bhi,
s:
Dard Apne Bhi Paraye Bhi,
Maarte Bhi Hain Jilayen Bhi,

Saha Itna Ho Gayi Dharti,
Paalne Ke Liye Maayen Bhi,

Dudho Nahati Puto Falti Hain,
Lambi Umar Wali Duayen Bhi,

Phool Jaisa Jab Khila Koi,
Khusbu Failati Hawayen Bhi,

Sari Duniya Khil Khila Uthe,
Kuchh Kate Karke Dikhayen Bhi…

st: Ahsas Dard Wale Dil Ko Nichodate Hain,
s:
Ahsas Dard Wale Dil Ko Nichodate Hain,
Jajbat Se Kisi Ke Bhi Aise Na Kheliye,

Insaniyat Ke Dushman Paate Nahi Mohabbat,
Iljaam Unke Hamne Apne Sar Pe Le Liye,

Aise Hi Nahin Khusiyan Mil Jaati Chahne Se,
Kuchh Dariya Toh Bahaiye Parbat Useliye,

Mushkil Toh Nahin Hai Kuch Jab Dil Mein Than Lein,
Mumkin Hain Khwabon Ke Mahal Insano Ke Liye,

Auro Ke Liye Jite Huye Dekha Jamane Ne,
Jadu Chalega Ek Din Kuchh Aur Jheliye…

st: In Dino Ka Dard Hum Kya Kya Ginayen,
s:
In Dino Ka Dard Hum Kya Kya Ginayen,
Chalo Kuchh Toh Zindagi Ko Samajh Paaye,

Kya Khabar Thi Aur Bhi Kuchh Hai Hakikat,
Bachpane Ke Khel Bachkana Adayen,

Badak Sakti Hain Nigahen Yaar Ki Bhi,
Tab Talak Toh Nahin Thi Aisi Havayen,

Dil Ki Baaten Yahan Karne Ki Manahi,
Yahan Dasturon Mein Bahti Bhavnayen,

Tujhko Kuchh Karna Hai Toh Kar Daal Jhatpat,
Kya Pata Aise Bhi Din Aayen Na Aayen….

st: Isko Kaleje Se,
s:
Isko Kaleje Se,
Maine Jo Laga Rakha Hai,
Dard Ne Paayi,
Mere Seene Mein Rahat Kaisi,

st: Aadmiyat Ki Shart Hai Eh Daag,
s:
Aadmiyat Ki Shart Hai Eh Daag,
Khub Apna Bura Bhale Samjhe,

st: Us Se Uthegi Kya Musibat E Ishq,
s:
Us Se Uthegi Kya Musibat E Ishq,
Ibtiha Ko Jo Ant Jaane…

st: Mujhko Isqe Julfe Ambar Faam Hai,
s:
Mujhko Isqe Julfe Ambar Faam Hai,
Subhe Mashar Bhi Najar Mein Sham Hai,

Ishq Par Takleef Ka Iljaam Hai,
Dard Mere Waste Aaram Hai,

Husn Mein Huro Pari Ka Naam Hai,
Aadmi Ko Aadmi Se Kaam Hai,

Bajm Se Mujhko Uthane Ke Liye,
Puchte Hain Aapko Kuchh Kaam Hai,

Maykade Kya Jaake Masjid Mein Bhi Rind,
Pooch Lete Hain May Gulfaam Hai…

st: Shole Dile Pursaaj Se Uthhte Hain Gajab Ke,
s:
Shole Dile Pursaaj Se Uthhte Hain Gajab Ke,
Yeh Aag Nahi Woh Jo Rahe Khak Mein Dab Ke,

Hota Hai Sareek Yeh Aap Dukh Dard Mein Sab Ke,
Kya Honsale Hain Yeh Dile Aajar Talab Ke,

Udhte Hi Pahunch Jaate Hain Ye Ta Dare Makshud,
Hai Daste Dua Mein Bhi Chalan Paaye Talab Ke,

Bewajah Koi Kisi Par Aasik Nahi Hota,
Hum Aalme Asabab Mein Kayal Hain Sabab Ke…

st: Vaqte Akhir Aa Hi Gaya Mout Ka Maja,
s:
Vaqte Akhir Aa Hi Gaya Mout Ka Maja,
Yeh Lajjat Aur Dard Ki Lajjat Mein Mil Gayi,

Is Par Bhi Humko Naaj Hai Mashoor Toh Huye,
Ruswayi Apni Aapki Shohrat Mein Mil Gayi,

Bulbul Ka Nala Kyu Meri Fariyad Mein Mila,
Kyu Gul Ki Rangat Aapki Rangat Mein Mil Gayi,

Eh Daag Sukar Kar Ki Sarafyab Tu Hua,
Dil Ki Murad Haj O Jiyarat Mein Mil Gayi

st: Dukh Dard Ki Gham Teri Furkat Mein Mil Gayi,
s:
Dukh Dard Ki Gham Teri Furkat Mein Mil Gayi,
Milni Thi Jo Saja Woh Mohabbat Mein Mil Gayi,

Yeh Mail Jhol Ki Soorat Mein Mil Gayi,
Tasveer Aapki Meri Hairat Mein Mil Gayi,

Dil Toh Hai Bechain Na Vahsat Mijaj Mein,
Aasais Aise Kunje K-Aanat Mein Mil Gayi,

Duniya Mein Janta Hu Ke Jannat Mili Mujhe,
Rahat Agar Jara Si Musibat Mein Mil Gayi…

st: Kahta Hu Dil Se Aur Hasee Dundhiye Koi,
s:
Kahta Hu Dil Se Aur Hasee Dundhiye Koi,
Aata Hai Fir Khyal Ke Aisa Koi Kahin Nahin,

Majhab Mein Apne Tark E Mulakat Kufar Hai,
Yea Baat Hamnasee Ki Toh Kuchh Dilnasee Nahin,

Kya Lutf De Rahi Hain Adayen Atb Ki,
Hai Mouj Bahre Husn Woh Mathe Ki Sikan Nahin,

Afsos Hai Ke Dard Bhi Ab Chhodta Hai Sath,
Yeh Bhi Akhir Vakt Kahi Hai Kahin Nahin,

Kahte Hain Log Daag Se Woh Badguman Hai,
Aisa Tumhaari Jaat Se Usko Yakin Nahee

st: Khana E Dil Mein Fareb Bhi Rahe Thoda Sa,
s:
Khana E Dil Mein Fareb Bhi Rahe Thoda Sa,
Ki Tera Daag Tera Dard Yahan Rahta Hai,

Beghar Tak Ki Khabar Updesh Mein Usne Kahi,
Yeh Toh Farmaye Ke Khuda Kahan Rahta Hai,

Apne Kuche Mein Nayi Raa Nikal Apne Liye,
Ki Yahan Aafat Ka Maara Insaan Rahta Hai,

Jakham Aaye Toh Sabhi Khusk Hua Karte Hain,
Daag Mitataa Hi Nahin Iske Nisaan Rahte Hain…

st: Hamse Barbaadi Ka Jasan,
s:
Hamse Barbaadi Ka Jasan,
Manaya Na Jaayega,

Hamse Teri Arthi Ka Bojh,
Uthaya Na Jayega,

Marna Hai Toh Kahin Or Jakar Mar,
Hamse Teri Mayyat Ko Dafnay Na Jaayega,

Dard Ka Mere Aap Yakin Kare Ya Na Karen,
Arj Itni Hai Ke Is Raaj Ki Charcha Na Karen…

st: Kyun Woh Hum Sab Ki,
s:
Kyun Woh Hum Sab Ki,
Itni Pariksha Leta Hai,

Kyun Humko Itna Dard Deta Hai,
Kyun Hamein Satata Hai,

Kyun Hamein Isq Karna Sikhata Hai,
Jab Anjaam Aisa Hi Likhna Hai Usko,

Toh Kyun Hamaari Zindagi Mein,
Kuchh Pal Ki Khusi Woh Lata Hai…

st: Teri Dosti Ne Mujhe,
s:
Teri Dosti Ne Mujhe,
Dard Sahna Sikha Diya,

Marti Huyi Rooh Ko Jeena Sikha Diya,
Kya Kahun Kya Hai Tera Saath Mere Liye,

Tere Saath Ne,
Mere Aansuo Ko Muskurana Sikha Diya…

st: Mohabbat Ho Gayi Jinse ,
s:
Mohabbat Ho Gayi Jinse ,
Unse Sikayat Kya Hogi,

Jubaan Tak Baat Jo Aayi ,
Yakinan Woh Dua Hogi,

Agar Woh Rooth Gaye Mujhse,
Koi Meri Hi Khata Hogi,

Ki Thi Suruaat Ek Chhote Se Majak Se,
Majak Dard Ban Jaayega, Maalum Na Tha,

Samajhte The Jise Hum Apna Yaar,
Woh Ek Din Pyar Ban Jaayega, Maalum Na Tha…

st: Juba Hilao To Ho Jaye Faisla Dil Ka,
s:
Juba Hilao To Ho Jaye Faisla Dil Ka,
Ab Aa Chukka Hai Jubaa Par Muaamala Dil Ka,

Kisi Se Kya Ho Tapish Mein Mukabila Dil Ka,
Jigar Ko Aankh Dikhata Hai Dard Dil Ka,

Kasoor Teri Nigah Ka Hai Kya Khata Uski,
Lagaav Ne Badhaya Hai Housla Dil Ka,

Agar Jaan Par Ban Gayi Mohabbat Mein,
Kisi Ke Muh Par Na Rakha Muaamala Dil Ka,

Kuchh Aur Bhi Ah Daag Tujhe Baat Aati Hai,
Wohi Buto Ki Sikayat Wohi Gila Dil Ka…

st: Chal mere hamnasi,
s:
Chal mere hamnasi,
Ab Is Chaman Mein Apna Gujara Nahin,

Baat Hoti Gulon Tak Toh Sah Lete Hum,
Ab Toh Kanto Pe Bhi Hak Hamara Nahin,

Kabhi Chaha Tujhe Aisa Ki Rab Jaisa Pooja,
kis Jagah Maine Tujhe Pukara Nahin,

Yun Dard Dekar Kya Mila Tujhe,
Kah Dete Ki Tum Se Milna Ab Ganvara Nahin…

st: Gairon Ki Kya Baat Karte Ho,
s:
Gairon Ki Kya Baat Karte Ho,
Hum Ne Apno Ko Aazmaya Hay,
Log Kanton Se Bach Kar Chalte Hay,
Hum Ne Phoolon Se Dard Paaya Hay…

st: Dard Ban Ke Dil Mein Aana,
s:
Dard Ban Ke Dil Mein Aana,
Koi Tum Se Seekh Jaaye,

Jaan Aasiq Ho Ke Jaana,
Koi Tum Se Seekh Jaaye,

Hamsukhan Par Rooth Jaana,
Koi Tum Se Seekh Jaaye,

Rooth Kar Fir Muskurana,
Koi Tum Se Seekh Jaaye,

Aate Jaate Yun Toh,
Dekhe Hain Hazaron Khus Haraam,

Dil Mein Aakaar Dil Se Jaana,
Koi Tum Se Seekh Jaaye…

st: Dard Hi Sahi Mere Isq Ka,
s:
Dard Hi Sahi Mere Isq Ka,
Innam To Aaya,

Khali Hi Sahi Hathon Mein,
Jaam To Aaya,

Main Hun Bewafa,
Sabko Bataya Usne,

Yun Hi Sahi Unke Labon Pe,
Mera Naam Toh Aaya…

st: Dil Ke Dard Ko Kisne Dekha Hai
s:
Dil Ke Dard Ko Kisne Dekha Hai
Jisne Dekha Hai Bas Chehra Dekha Hai
Dard Toh Tanhaiyon Mein Aata Hai
Hume Toh Logon Nai Bas Haste Dekha Hai…

st: Ah Khuda Aaj Yeh Faisla Kar De,
s:
Ah Khuda Aaj Yeh Faisla Kar De,
Use Mera Yaa Mujhe Uska Kar De,

Bahut Dard Sahe Hain Maine,
Koi Khusi Ab Toh Mukkadar Kar De,

Bahut Muskil Lagta Hai Us Se Door Rahna,
Judai Ke Safar Ko Kam Kar De,

Jitna Door Chale Gaye Who Mujh Se,
Utna Kareeb Kar De,

Nahi Likha Agar Naseeb Mein Unka Naam,
Toh Khatam Yeh Zindagi Aur Mujhe Fanna Kar De…

st: Zindgi Itne Dard Deti Hai,
s:
Zindgi Itne Dard Deti Hai,

Fir Bhi Umeed Rahti Hai,

Kehte Hai Ki Koi Yaad Nahi Karega,

Par Aap Toh Karoge Ye Umeed Rahti Hai…

st: Bina Humsafar Ke Kab Talak,
s:
Bina Humsafar Ke Kab Talak,
Koi Musaafaton Mein Lagaa Rahe,

Jahaa Koi Kisi Se Judaa Naa Ho,
Mujhe Us Raah Ki Talash Hai,

Mujhe Dekh Kar Jo Eik Nazar,
Mere Sare Dard Samajh Sake,

Jo Is Kadar Ho Chiraag-E-Ghar,
Mujhe Us Nigaah Ki Talaash Hai

st: Bhool Jaana Tha To Phir Apna Banaaya Kyon Tha,
s:
Bhool Jaana Tha To Phir Apna Banaaya Kyon Tha,
Jhooti Ulfat Ka Yakin Dilaaya Kyon Tha,

Apni Chaahat Ka Yaqin Dilaya Kyon Tha,
Chhoti Manzil Ka Nisaaha Banaaya Kyon Tha…

Woh Muskura Ke Dard Taal Deta Hai,
Kisi Kisi Ko Khuda Yeh Kamaal Deta Hai,

Nazar Uthaa Ke Jis Ko Dekh Le Woh Ek Bar,
Yakeen Karo Use Mushkil Mein Daal Deta Hai…

st: Mujhe Dard-E-Ishq Ka Mazaa Maloom Hai,
s:
Mujhe Dard-E-Ishq Ka Mazaa Maloom Hai,
Dard-E-Dil Ki Inteha Maloom Hai,

Zindagi Bhar Muskuraane Ki Dua Naa Dena,
Mujhe Pal Bhar Muskuraane Ki Sazaa Maloom Hai

Bichad Jaana Tu Us Ke Liye Maayane Nahin Rakhta,
Jafaon Ka Apni Hisaab Woh Zubaani Nahin Rakhta,

Rotaa Nahin Yaa Use Ronaa Nahin Aata,
Sungdil Hai Yaa Phir Aankhon Mein Paani Nahin Rakhta…

st: De Kar Zakhm-A-Jigar Gayaa Koi,
s:
De Kar Zakhm-A-Jigar Gayaa Koi,
Asak Daaman Mein Bhar Gayaa Koi,

Chand Lamhon Ko Saamne Aakar,
Noor Ankhon Mein Bhar Gayaa Koi,

Naam Lekar Teraa Pukaara Hai,
Paas Se Jab Guzar Gayaa Koi,

Phir Sadak Par Hujoom Dekha Hai,
Phir Sare Raah Mein Mar Gaya Koi…

st: Kinaaro Par Motee Mila Nahin Karte Hain
s:
Kinaaro Par Motee Mila Nahin Karte Hain
Dard Mein Kabhee Gilaa Nahin Karte Hain,
Ham Achhe Naa Sahee Bure Hi Sahee,
Lekin Ham Jaise Bure Bhee,
Har Kisi Ko Milaa Nahin Karte Hain…

st: Bahut Ajib Darad Hotaa Hai Naa ,
s:
Bahut Ajib Darad Hotaa Hai Naa ,
Jub Yad Aati Hai,

Aawaj Toh Nahin Hotee,
Par Dil Kee Dhadkan Badh Jaati Hai,

Aakhon Ke Raaste Chamakate Motee Girane Lagte hai,
Agar Us Pal,

Apne Seene ko Naa Dabaa Loo ,
Toh Jaise Jaan Nikalti Jaati Hai

st: Jindgi Ke Sawalon Ka Jawab Dundta Hun,
s:
Jindgi Ke Sawalon Ka Jawab Dundta Hun,
Dard Ko Kam Kar Sake Voh Saraab Dundhta Hun;
Vakat Ke Haaton Majboor Ek Sakhs Hun Main,
Jeene Ka Jo De Bahana Voh Keetab Dundhta Hun Main…

st: Nasha Hum Karte Hai,
s:
Nasha Hum Karte Hai,
Ilzam Sharab ko Milta Hai,
Magar Ilzam Sharab Ka Nahi Unka Hai,
Jinka Chehra Ham Har Jam Me Nazar Ata Hai…

st: Shikayat hame bhi zindagi se nahi,
s:
Shikayat hame bhi zindagi se nahi,
Jee Rahe Hain Magar Khushi Se Nahi,
Dukh bhi diya har sakhs ne humko,
Or naraz bhi hum kisi se nahi…

st: Mandir Mein Phool Chadhane Gaye To Ehsas Hua Ki,
s:
Mandir Mein Phool Chadhane Gaye To Ehsas Hua Ki,
Patharon Ki Khushi Ke Liye Phoolo Ka Qatal Ker Aaye Hai Hum,
Mitane Gaye The Paap Jahan,
Wahin Ek Aur Paap Ker Aaye Hum

st: Khwaish thi dil ki dil-e-yaar dum nikle,
s:
Khwaish thi dil ki dil-e-yaar dum nikle,
Maut aayi to do gaz zameen na mil saki,
Aankhe deedar-e-yaar tarshti reh gayi,
Saanse thammi par aah bhi na nikal saki…

st: Humare Dard Ki Un Tak Bhala Kaise Khabar Pahunche,
s:
Humare Dard Ki Un Tak Bhala Kaise Khabar Pahunche,
Jahan Sapne Nhi Aate, Vahan Kaise Nazar Pahunche,
Ki Dil Toota Kisi Ka, Ye Unhe Maloom Kaise Ho,
Ye Darpan To Nhi, Tootey To Sabke Paas Swaar Pahunche…

st: Aarzu Ye Nhi Ke Gham Ka Tufaan Tall Jaye,
s:
Aarzu Ye Nhi Ke Gham Ka Tufaan Tall Jaye,
Fikar To Ye Hai Ke Tumhara Dil Na Badal Jaye,
Kabhi Bhi Mujh Ko Agar Bhulana Chaho Tum,
To Dard Itna Dena Ke Mera Dum Nikal Jaye…

st: Gehri Thi Raat Lekin Hum The Ke Soye Nahi
s:
Gehri Thi Raat Lekin Hum The Ke Soye Nahi
Dard Bahut Tha Dil Mein Par Hum Roye Nahi
Koi Nahi Hai Hamara Jo Puchhey Humse
Jaag Rahe Ho Kisi Ke Liye Ya Kisi Ke Liye Soye Nahi…

st: Zindagi itni dard bhari Kyun hai,
s:
Zindagi itni dard bhari Kyun hai,
Dard apko hai to takleef hamein Kyun hai,
Mere pal pal ki khabar rakhne wale dost,
Tu aaj mujse bekhabar Kyun hai…

st: Wo aksar tanha chhod jate hain
s:
Wo aksar tanha chhod jate hain
Bas mera dard mere sath rah jata hai
Main hanskar gale lag jata hu
Jab dard akela rah jata hai…

st: Ek Shaks Paas Reh Ke Samjhaa Nahi Mujhe,
s:
Ek Shaks Paas Reh Ke Samjhaa Nahi Mujhe,
Is Baat Ka Malal Hai Shikwa Nahi Mujhe,
Main Us Ko Bewafai Ka Ilzam Kaisay Doon
Us Ne To Ibteda Se Hi Chaha Nahi Mujhe,
Pathar Samajh Kar Paon Se Thokr Laga Di,
Afsos Teri Aankh Ne Parkha Nahi Mujhe,
Kya Umedein Baandh Kar Aaya Tha Samnay,
Us Ne To Aankh Bhar Ke Dekha Nahi Mujhe…

st: Parwane wo bhi the,
s:
Parwane wo bhi the,
diwane hum bhi the,
Sannata udhar bhi tha,
khamoshi idhar bhi thi,
Chahat udhar bhi thi,
ibadat idhar bhi thi,
Chandni udhar bhi thi,
roshni idhar bhi thi,
Kayamat udhar bhi thi,
nazakat idhar bhi thi,
Fark sirf itna tha yaaro,
na wo mere the, na main unki thi…

st: dard hi dard bhra hai seene mein,
s:
dard hi dard bhra hai seene mein,
ab kyu samne aa-aa kar,
takleef de rahe ho jeene mein,

dard hi dard bhra hai seene mein…

st: Woh Humara Imtihaan Kya Legi,
s:
Woh Humara Imtihaan Kya Legi,
Milegi Nazro Se Nazrein To Apni Palkein Jhuka Legi,
Usey Meri Maieyat Par Diya Jalane Ko Mat Kehna,
Wo Nadaan Hai Dosto, Apne Haath Jala Legi…

st: sabne kaha mohabbat ek haseen gunah hai,
s:
sabne kaha mohabbat ek haseen gunah hai,
koi is gunah ki saza ka dard humse pucho…
sab kehte hai ye dard bahot mitha hota hai,
koi iski karwahat ka raaz humse pucho…

st: Soch raha hun, Akhir meri jindgi me kya kum hai,
s:
Soch raha hun, Akhir meri jindgi me kya kum hai,
mujhe hashane ka kisme dum hai,
kyon nikalti hai dard bhari shayari dil se,
aakhir mujhko kiska gum hai,
achhe yaaro ka sath bhi hai,
achhi khasi aukat bhi hai,
kyun tanhaiyon se nikal nahi pata hun main,
jaroor dard bhari koi baat bhi hai,
ishq ya dosti aakhir jindgi me kya ahem hai,
kyun nikalti hai dard bhari shayari dil se,
aakhir mujhko kiska gum hai…
